Title: AB12 Fairtex MMA Board Shorts Burn
Body HTML:
Fairtex board shorts are the ultimate cross over shorts that are perfect for MMA, Muaythai or any other sport, as well as being very stylish for wearing casually.

Made from light, fast drying and comfortable microfiber fabric with a secure elastic waist and concealed drawstring for maximum comfort and a secure fit.

Spandex lycra stretch panels at inside legs and across the back for ease of movement.

8" side slit for high kicks and un-restricted movement.

Features:

  • Fast drying and comfortable microfiber
  • Secure elastic waist and concealed drawstring
  • Spandex lycra stretch panels
  • 8" side slit for high kicks

Title: BEPL2 Twins Special Leather Belly Pad Black
Body HTML:
The Twins Belly Pad is made to handle the world-class punishment that Top fighters dish out. It comes with a Velcro waist closure at the back; this allows for quick transitions from one training scenarios to the next; it also ensure an easy, secure fit.

The Belly Pad is ideal for training push kicks, knee strikes, and overall clinch training; it can be used in combination with punching mitts and kicking pads.

Made from 100% Thai leather and fine, high density padding.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Reinforced front
  • Side targets
  • Thick velcro strap

Title: BJJ2 Fairtex Matchanu Premium BJJ Gi Navy
Body HTML:
The Matchanu Model Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Training Set is a special limited edition production line of the finest quality with a Matchanu design based on the character from Ramayana literature.

The idea applies contemporary Thai art with original distinctly Thai design to create a special product in an international slim-fit style. The Matchanu Model has been developed to be unique and different from all existing products on the market.

Matchanu is a son of Hanuman and Supannamatcha. He has the body of a monkey with a fish tail. He serves in the pond guarding the underworld and holds the lotus as a weapon.

Jacket is made from Pearl Weave 550 gram and 245 gram Rip Stop Pants. Light weight, offering great mobility and increased agility without sacrificing durability or strength. Pearl weave is quick drying and holds less sweat.

Double-stitched with reinforced pants to withstand the heaviest of use. The rip-stop fabric is a very comfortable gi material, it is lightweight and very breathable.

Includes a nylon drawstring for a comfortable and secure fit.

Comes with a drawstring bag packaging and product tag also included.

Designed under IBJJF rules.

Features:

  • Made in Thailand
  • Pearl Weave Jacket
  • Rip-Stop pants
  • Premium quality
  • Double stitched & reinforced
  • Designed under IBJJF rules

Title: BL5 Fairtex Liniment Oil - Orange Scent 100ml
Body HTML:
Fairtex liniment massage oil has a cooling-warming effect, suitable as a pre-workout warm up massage oil which is easy to spread.

Great for post-workout relief.

Perfect for athletes, but also for those who need to warm up and prepare the muscles for exercise.


APPLICATION

  • Apply and massage the affected area (For external use only).


PACKAGING

  • Available in 100 ml bottles. Suitable for travelling with.


INGREDIENTS (INCI)

  • Active Ingredients: Methyl Salicylate, Menthol Racemic, Eucalyptus Oil
  • Also contains: Orange Oil, Olive Oil, Lanolin, Mineral Oil, D&C Yellow No.11

*Do not use if you are sensitive to any ingredient contained in this product.

WARNINGS

  • For external use only.
  • Keep out of the reach of children.
  • Not suitable for expecting and nursing mothers.
  • Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
  • Do not use the product on damaged skin.
  • If a hypersensitivity reaction occurs on the skin, stop using immediately and consult a doctor.
  • Do not apply the product to the entire surface of the body with a single application.
  • Don’t ingest.
  • Wash hands thoroughly after use


FDA Approved

  • FDA no.G549/62
Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Massage & Relaxation > Massage Oil

Title: BL5 Fairtex Liniment Oil - Orange Scent 100ml
Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Massage & Relaxation > Massage Oil

Title: BS Fairtex X URFACE Limited Edition Muaythai Shorts
Body HTML:
URFACE is a well-known Thai streetwear company inspired by Pop Art, owned by one of Thailand’s top illustrators: Mr.Arak Aonwilai a.k.a. “Sahred Toy” who has collaborated with Coca-Cola, BMW, Lee jeans, etc.

URFACE joins forces with Fairtex to produce a limited edition run of gloves and shorts. The project features exclusive artwork for Fairtex and will become a showcase in the Thai streetwear scene.

Slim cut Muaythai shorts with a high side slit for un-restricted kicking. New better satin fabric, long lasting and stays in shape.

New style piping on the legs for a premium finish.

Featuring a smaller 6-strip elastic waistband rather than the traditional 8. Secure if needed with an inner drawstring.

Handmade in Thailand.

Features:

  • Exclusively designed by URFACE
  • Long lasting satin
  • Slim cut fit
  • High side slit

Medium 28"
Large 30"

Title: BS1701 Fairtex Slim Fit Muaythai Shorts Yellow
Body HTML:
Slim cut Muaythai shorts with a high side slit for un-restricted kicking. New better satin fabric, long lasting and stays in shape.

New style piping on the legs for a premium finish.

Featuring a smaller 6-strip elastic waistband rather than the traditional 8. Secure if needed with an inner drawstring.

Handmade in Thailand.

Title: BS1901 Fairtex Black Stealth Muaythai Shorts
Body HTML:
Fairtex Muay Thai shorts are designed to give fighters the edge they need in the ring. Tailored to be slimmer than traditional sizing, these shorts enhance your mobility and agility, allowing you to move with precision and speed.

Despite the slimmer cut, they maintain a larger fit compared to our kickboxing collection, ensuring optimal comfort and flexibility, even during the most intense training sessions.

New style piping on the legs for a premium finish.

Featuring a smaller 6-strip elastic waistband rather than the traditional 8. Secure if needed with an inner drawstring.

Handmade in Thailand.

  • High side slit

Fairtex Muay Thai shorts are designed to give fighters the edge they need in the ring. Tailored to be slimmer than traditional sizing, these shorts enhance your mobility and agility, allowing you to move with precision and speed.

Despite the slimmer cut, they maintain a larger fit compared to our kickboxing collection, ensuring optimal comfort and flexibility, even during the most intense training sessions.

New style piping on the legs for a premium finish.

Featuring a smaller 6-strip elastic waistband rather than the traditional 8. Secure if needed with an inner drawstring.

Handmade in Thailand.

Features:

  • Long lasting satin
  • Slim cut fit
  • High side slit
  • Handmade in Thailand

Size

Waist

Medium 28"
Large 30"
XL 32"
XXL 34"

Title: Fairtex FMV13 Maximized Focus Mitts - Black-Gold
Body HTML:
Constructed with a microfiber outer shell, the same high-quality odourless material used in our renowned “MADDOX” range of grappling dummies, the FMV13 is designed for precision, speed, and durability.

Our Maximized Focus Mitts are ideal for trainers and fighters looking to elevate their training in striking accuracy and reflexes.

These mitts are tough and durable while also providing maximum comfort. The extra padding on the palm offers excellent protection against strikes. Breathable mesh is added to the hand cover for ventilation.

Features:

  • Soft padding
  • Expanded training area
  • Durable microfiber shell
  • Mesh hand covers
  • Extra padding on the palm

Title: GD2 Fairtex Maddox II Ultimate Grappling Dummy
Body HTML:
The evolved and improved version of the world's best grappling dummy.

The new model now features both hands and feet to perform even more holds and submissions. Also now has an improved posture, leaning forward which simulates a more realistic position of an opponent in your guard.

Made from special microfiber synthetic leather which is very durable and easy to wipe clean.

Shoulder system designed by Fairtex to realistically perform triangle chokes, arm bars and arm triangles and drill them over and over full strength without requiring a training partner.

It can used for top or bottom positions and the legs can stretch out. It's possible to drill any position realistically with the Maddox II.

Strong base with sand filled up bottom half of the legs.

The neck is designed to support rear chokes, guillotine chokes, darce choke, anaconda choke etc, just like you would do on a real person.

Good for all kind of controls; side mount, full mount, north south, back control etc.

Features:

  • Has hands and feet
  • Suitable for all MMA/BJJ positions
  • Realistic posture for in your guard
  • Durable microfiber outer shell
  • All submissions are possible
  • Great for drilling or practising at home

Title: HB10 Fairtex Bowling Bag (FILLED)
Body HTML:
Constructed of Syntek Leather with heavy duty water resistant and non-tear nylon lining with nylon web straps.

Fairtex original design for punching, kicking and kneeing drills with unique tear drop shape to simulate an opponent.

Supports correct knee practising by moving straps up so that user does not hold it during knee practising but holds the hands around the bottleneck instead - the correct way to practice knees. At the same time, training area is extended by moving nylon straps up.

With proper installation, this bag is also designed for low kick and neck kick practising as well.

Bottleneck simulates neck of human.

The undisputed best clinching bag available anywhere.

We recommend using a swivel on Fairtex punch bags which allows the bag to freely spin, increasing the life of the straps.

Features:

  • The best clinching bag
  • Long-lasting Syntek Leather
  • Water resistant and non-tear nylon lining
  • Nylon web straps

Title: RMS117 TUFF High-Cut Retro Muaythai Shorts The Immortal Yaksa
Body HTML:
The Immortal Yaksa is inspired by the character in Ramayana, also known as Thotsakan in Thai famous literature. He is depicted as a powerful titan with ten heads, each representing different aspects of his personality.

In the story from Thai literature, Thotsakan performed a ritual to become immortal, granting him great powers and fearlessness of death. He also combined his strength with the yantra, a mystic symbol representing protection, in all eight directions, providing him with extra protection from danger.

This Yantra is popular among both Thai and international tattoo enthusiasts, known for its versatile protective properties. Combined with the Thai words “คงกระพัน” (Khong Kraphan) on the front of the shorts, it symbolizes resilience against any harm or danger, making these shorts truly unparalleled.

Title: Yuth Kick Shield Black
Body HTML:
Introducing the Yuth Kick Shield - your ultimate partner in martial arts training. Engineered with precision and durability in mind, this kick shield is crafted to withstand the most rigorous workouts while providing optimal protection for trainers and fighters alike.

Designed with high-density foam padding, the Yuth Kick Shield absorbs impact effectively, reducing the risk of injury during intense training sessions.

Its sturdy construction and reinforced stitching ensure long-lasting performance, making it a reliable companion for both beginners and seasoned practitioners.

Fairtex Approved - Made in Thailand in conjunction with Fairtex in Pattaya and all hand tested in their world famous muaythai gym.

Features:

  • High-density foam padding
  • Sturdy construction and reinforced stitching
  • For both beginners and seasoned practitioners
  • Made in Thailand
  • Fairtex approved

Designed with the input of professional fighters and trainers, Yuth Thai Pads offer optimal padding and shock absorption, ensuring both the trainer and the athlete can focus on technique and power without worrying about injury.

Body HTML:

Attached curved thumb design for optimal fist closure, minimising hand and wrist muscle tensions and minimising eye and thumb injuries.

Specially designed for sparring with additional wrist support and knuckle padding for maximum safety.

  • Triple-layer foam
  • Pre-curved thumb
  • Designed for sparring

Designed specifically for heavy punchers with double layers of high density latex foam padding.

Weight of padding system is evenly distributed from cuff to head of gloves for maximum control and performance. Nylon water repellent lining offers protection against sweat entering padding.

The dense padding makes these ideal for heavy bag work and pad sessions, giving maximum protection for your hands and wrists.

Not recommended for sparring or competition.

Title: BGV Fairtex X URFACE Limited Edition Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
URFACE is a well-known Thai streetwear company inspired by Pop Art, owned by one of Thailand’s top illustrators: Mr.Arak Aonwilai a.k.a. “Sahred Toy” who has collaborated with Coca-Cola, BMW, Lee jeans, etc.

URFACE joins forces with Fairtex to produce a limited edition run of gloves and shorts. The project features exclusive artwork for Fairtex and will become a showcase in the Thai streetwear scene.

Premium Microfiber with genuine leather piping. Odourless material after use, smooth to the touch and very durable.

Exclusive design, cut and pattern of Fairtex premium gloves with the highest quality of craftsmanship.

No longer sold with an Acrylic Box, boxing gloves only.

Features a grip bar.

Features:

  • Exclusively designed by URFACE
  • Limited edition run
  • Premium Microfiber

Title: BGV Fairtex YAMANTAKA Limited Edition Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
The 2024 Special Edition Microfiber Boxing gloves features a gorgeous and powerful painting by our artist to depict another side of the Buddhist god called “Yamantaka” in some cultures. Influenced by Tibetan and Japanese art and belief.

Yamāntaka is a Sanskrit name that can be broken down into two primary elements: Yama (यम), –the god of death; and antaka (अन्तक) –destroyer. Thus, Yamāntaka means “Destroyer of Death” or "Conqueror of Death".

Each pair of gloves has a gold leaf put on top of the art, it will peel off after a few uses and leave an antique look on the gloves. Therefore these gloves are more than just boxing gloves, it’s a piece of art you can collect.

Each pair of gloves come with a canvas sack bag.

Features:

  • Microfiber gloves
  • Limited edition
  • Influenced by Tibetan and Japanese art and belief
  • Comes in a custom canvas sack bag
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & MMA Gloves & Mitts

Title: BGV11 Fairtex F-Day Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
Limited edition glove design from Fairtex made using Microfiber for the outer shell to make a consistent weight.

Microfiber is odorless, endurable, flexible, soft and a smooth finish. As it's a non-leather material, it's vegan friendly.

Longer cuff than classic BGV1 which provides comfort and wrist support. Also has a grip bar and holes on the inside thumb and above grip bar for added ventilation.

No longer supplied with promotional materials - gloves only.

Features:

  • Premium Microfiber
  • Vegan friendly
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Fairtex BGV14 Microfibre Boxing Gloves - Red
Body HTML:
New design gloves with long cuff made using Microfiber for the outer shell to make a consistent weight.

Microfiber is odourless, endurable, flexible, soft and a smooth finish. As it's a non-leather material, it's vegan friendly.

Very easy to form a fist in order to save your energy during training. Combines some characteristics of the classic #BGV6 sparring gloves with extra padding on the palm area for maximum comfort and safety.

Features:

  • Long cuff design
  • Padded palm
  • Easy to form a fist
  • High quality Microfiber

Title: Fairtex BGV14PT Painter Microfibre Boxing Gloves - Black-White
Body HTML:
The paint-splash design of each pair of gloves is made by hand, one by one and depending on the mood of our artist. So, you will own unique gloves that only belong to you and never found anywhere else. No two pairs will ever be the same; a groundbreaking new concept from Fairtex.

New design gloves with long cuff made using Microfiber for the outer shell to make a consistent weight.

Microfiber is odourless, endurable, flexible, soft and a smooth finish. As it's a non-leather material, it's vegan friendly.

Very easy to form a fist in order to save your energy during training. Combines some characteristics of the classic #BGV6 sparring gloves with extra padding on the palm area for maximum comfort and safety.

Due to the nature of this unique concept, the design you get will vary slightly from those shown in the picture.

Features:

  • Individually hand-painted
  • Each pair is unique
  • Easy to form a fist
  • High quality Microfiber

Title: Fairtex BGV19 Deluxe Tight-Fit Boxing Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
The latest glove from Fairtex improves on the classic #BGV1 universal model with an improved hand compartment that is more tight fitting and compact than usual, with slightly more padding on the knuckle area. This combined with an improved thumb position similar the the #BGV16 and the inclusion of a grip bar makes these one of the finest compact tight-fit gloves available.

Constructed of premium quality leather with Fairtex's signature three-layered foam system for excellent hand and knuckle protection and shock disbursement.

Features:

  • Deluxe version of #BGV1 style
  • More tight fitting and compact
  • More padding on the knuckle area
  • Improved thumb position
  • Includes a grip bar
  • Premium quality leather

Title: BGV20 Fairtex Leather Boxing Gloves Pastel Blue
Body HTML:
Made from 100% Thai leather and with a smooth matte finish, the limited edition #BGV20 features an improved fit and padding compared to the standard #BGV1.

Available only for a limited time in this unique pastel blue colour inspired by current Pantone colour trends.

Particularly designed with women in mind, they are comfortable and soft feeling with a compact tight fit making it very easy to form a fist to save you energy during training.

Features a grip bar and 30 air ventilation holes per pair, made by hand.

Features:

  • Matte finish
  • Unique pastel colour
  • Comfortable and soft
  • Compact tight fit

Title: BGV24 Fairtex The Beauty of Survival Limited Edition Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
Made from 100% Thai leather using and exclusive design, cut, and pattern of Fairtex premium gloves with the highest quality of craftsmanship.

The artwork is a Raven fighting with a Serpent for survival. Roses represent the beauty or the other side of violence which is trying to convey the picture of Muaythai. The misconception of our sport is it's sometimes violent but the other side of the coin is that when 2 people fight to survive or win it's.... passion which is the beauty of this sport.

Features a grip bar and locked thumb.

Features:

  • 100% Thai leather
  • Grip bar and locked thumb
  • Custom Concept Artwork

Title: BGV9 Fairtex Mexican Style Boxing Gloves Black
Body HTML:
Designed specifically for heavy punchers with a two layered "High Impact" latex foam core system around the hitting area with the weight evenly distributed from wrist to head of gloves. With a contoured hand compartment and attached curved-thumb design for optimal fist closure, minimising muscle tension.

Extra long cuff with triple ribbed design to provide greater comfort and wrist support.

Improved model now features a improved hand compartment as well as better padding on the knuckle area making these ideal for both sparring and bag work.

Nylon water repellent lining offers protection against sweat entering padding.

Well suited for boxing but also good for Muaythai and other martial arts training.

Features:

  • Designed for heavy punchers
  • Two-layer high-impact foam core
  • Contoured hand compartment
  • Extra long cuff
  • Ideal for both sparring and bag work
  • Nylon water repellent lining

Title: BGVL11 Twins Long-Cuff Boxing Gloves Black-Olive
Body HTML:
Twins long-cuff velcro boxing gloves designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Great all-round use gloves ideal for use on pads, bags and for sparring.

Featuring additional padding for on the palm area and padding on the back of the wrist for extra support and protection.

Locked thumb design for maximum safety and to protect from injuries.

Durable velcro wrist strap gives a secure, comfortable fit and ensures long lasting gloves that will really last the distance.

Made from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Premium cowhide leather
  • Long cuff
  • Padded palm
  • Extra wrist support
  • Multi-layer high-impact foam core
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Fairtex FGV12 Ultimate MMA Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
The Fairtex FGV12 Ultimate Combat Gloves are designed for both striking and grappling in MMA fights. They feature an open-thumb loop that allows for greater thumb mobility and makes it easier to grab an opponent during clinches or takedowns.

The gloves feature a patented open-palm design with split knuckles and the signature open-thumb loop designed for optimal grappling control with minimal restriction.

Made from premium quality leather, they incorporate Fairtex’s signature three-layered foam core system for outstanding hand and knuckle protection with excellent shock absorption.

Official gloves of ONE Championship, Cage Warriors and previously seen on major MMA events such as Strikeforce, WEC, EliteXC, IFL, HDnet, Bodog, Affliction, M1, Pancrase, Fusion Fighting Championship and more.

Features:

  • Open-thumb loop for enhanced mobility
  • Three-layered foam core for superior protection
  • Premium quality leather

Title: Fairtex HB3 Extra Large Leather Heavy Bag - Black-Green (UN-FILLED)
Body HTML:
Extra-large design to provide a more imposing opponent to hit and build more strength and power to the upper body.

Constructed of high grade Thai Leather and non-tear nylon at the top with heavy duty water resistant and non-tear nylon lining with nylon web straps.

We recommend using a swivel on Fairtex punch bags which allows the bag to freely spin, increasing the life of the straps.

Features:

  • Extra-large design
  • High grade Thai leather
  • heavy duty water resistant and non-tear nylon lining
  • Nylon web straps

We recommend using a swivel on Fairtex punch bags which allows the bag to freely spin, increasing the life of the straps.

  • Nylon web straps

Title: HB7 Fairtex 7ft Pole Bag Black (UN-FILLED)
Body HTML:
Designed for versatile use to further develop your knee and elbow techniques, power kick and punch combinations, high and low kicks, hand and foot jabs, and other drills.

Constructed of Fairtex Syntek Leather with heavy duty non-tear and water resistant nylon lining.

Featuring the heavy duty nylon web straps, “no more noises and no more rusty chains” with reinforced stitching an rivets at key stress points for lasting durability.

Designed for hanging or floor mounted (pole and mounting hardware not included)

Supplied UN-FILLED only as it is impossible to deliver at the filled weight.

Features:

  • Designed for versatile use
  • Long-lasting Syntek Leather
  • Water resistant and non-tear nylon lining
  • Nylon web straps & inner tube for pole mount (not included)

Height Diameter Pole Diameter Weight (Filled)
210 cm 59 cm 15 cm 140 kg

Title: HG14 Fairtex Full Face Protector Headguard Black
Body HTML:
The Fairtex Full Face Headguard offers the ultimate face protection, reinventing the "face-saver" headgear in an original new design. Ideal for when you need more protection during sparring, if you are recovering from a nose injury but still need to train or if you have had nose surgery.

Offers a wide diagonal view, eliminating blind spots the same as the HG13 headguard.

The nose and mouth are protected by a reinforced metal plate, covered with high quality foam with additional air holes for easy breathing.

Reinforced cheek and chin padding to accommodate the metal plate design and maintain it's durability. Has a windshield for extra ear protection.

Features:

  • Metal plate protects nose and mouth
  • Full range of vision
  • Reinforced cheek and chin padding
  • Handmade in Thailand
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & Martial Arts Headgear

Title: HG14 Fairtex Full Face Protector Headguard Black
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & Martial Arts Headgear

Title: HG14 Fairtex Full Face Protector Headguard Black

Title: HGL3 Twins Leather Sparring Headguard Black
Body HTML:
The Twins Headguard has additional padding in the chin and cheek areas. It allows for a good range-of-vision while still offering a high degree of protection.

It is designed for full contact sparring and holds up to the punishment dished out by world-class fighters. The firm, high-density foam padding and greater face coverage increase safety and improve the balance between comfort and shock absorption.

Made from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Designed for sparring
  • Lace-up top
  • Durable Velcro back closure
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & Martial Arts Headgear

Title: HW2PN Fairtex Phra Nakhon Retro Wraps Set of 3 Pairs
Body HTML:
Enhance your training with the Fairtex Hand Wraps 'Phra Nakhon'. Crafted with care in 3 vibrant colours, these hand wraps provide excellent wrist support and protection, allowing you to perform at your best. Train confidently with the trusted choice of champions.

Introducing the New Collection of Hand Wraps: "Phra Nakhon"

"Phra Nakhon" was the alternate name for the capital city of Thailand during 1944, also known as Thailand during World War II. Our inaugural product from this throwback collection features retro hand wraps, packaged in a set of three colours enclosed in a vintage-style lucky bag.

Sold as a set of 3 pairs.

Features:

  • Set of 3 pairs
  • Retro colours
  • 4.5m long
  • Thumb loop & velcro tab

Title: HW4 Fairtex Elastic Mesh Handwraps Black
Body HTML:
Professional hand wraps made of 20% rubber that offers more flexibility when compared with traditional wraps.

The wrap can be stretched out and fit with any individual hand shape and firmly enhance wrist support.

Due to the wide ventilated holes with a mixture of polyester and rubber, these premium hand wraps are highly stable and can restore their original shape after regular use and cleaning through a long period of time.

This hand wrap is suitable for many types of sports, such as Muay Thai, fitness, cardio training, etc., and purposes of hand and wrist protection.

Features:

  • Material: Nylon 75%, Rubber 20%, Polyester 5%
  • 4.5m (180") long
  • Wide ventilated holes
  • Retains shape after washing and heavy use

Title: Namman Muay Active Cream 100g
Body HTML:
New improved natural formula Namman Muay Active Cream, The Quick Relief Thai Cream For Discomfort And Stiffness. Now incorporating the natural power of Menthol, Juniper, MSM, Camphor, Clove Oil and reduced amounts of Methyl Salicylate.

  • Soothe tensed muscles.
  • Improve mobility
  • Provides relief even under the most extreme circumstances
  • The Original Thai Cream, used for nearly a hundred years.


APPLICATION

  • Apply the product to the desired area up to 2 times a day.


PACKAGING

  • Available in 100g tubes.
  • 1 Box = 100 x tubes


INGREDIENTS (INCI)

  • Aqua, Menthol, Polysorbate 20, Polysorbate 80, Isopropyl Alcohol, Juniperus Communis Fruit Oil, Camphor, Dimethyl Sulfone, Sorbitan Caprylate, Propanediol, Benzoic Acid, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Eugenia Caryophyllus Flower Oil, Methyl Salicylate, *Limonene, *Eugenol, *Linalool, *Isoeugeno

*Do not use if you are sensitive to any ingredient contained in this product.

WARNINGS

  • For external use only.
  • Keep out of the reach of children.
  • Not suitable for expecting and nursing mothers.
  • Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
  • Do not use the product on damaged skin.
  • If a hypersensitivity reaction occurs on the skin, stop using immediately and consult a doctor.
  • Do not apply the product to the entire surface of the body with a single application.
  • Don’t ingest.
  • Wash hands thoroughly after use


CERTIFIED

  • Not tested on animals
  • Dermatological tested
  • Microbiological tested
Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Massage & Relaxation > Massage Oil

Title: Namman Muay Boxing Liniment 120ml
Body HTML:
Straight from Thailand and the world of Muay Thai... Namman Muay liniment - The very same muscle rub used by the world’s most feared fighters for nearly a hundred years.

Now incorporating the natural power of Eucalyptus, MSM, Capsicum, Cypress, Clove, Juniper and reduced amounts of Methyl Salicylate.

  • Ideal pre-workout application
  • Perfect for Intense Sport Massages
  • Provides relief even under the Most Extreme Circumstances
  • The Original Thai Oil, used for nearly a hundred years.


APPLICATION

  • Apply the product to the desired area up to 2 times a day.


PACKAGING

  • Available in 120 ml bottles
  • 1 box = 49 x bottles


INGREDIENTS (INCI)

  • Paraffinum Liquidum, Aqua, Alcohol Denat, Ethyl Salicylate, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Menthol, Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, Dimethyl Sulfone, Eugenia Caryophyllus Bud Oil, Cymbopogon Flexuosus Oil, Camphor, Juniperus Communis Fruit Oil, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Zingiber Officinale Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Methyl Salicylate, Citral*, Citronellol*, Eugenol*, Farnesol*, Geraniol*, Limonene*, Linalool*, Benzyl Benzoate*

*Do not use if you are sensitive to any ingredient contained in this product.

WARNINGS

  • For external use only.
  • Keep out of the reach of children.
  • Not suitable for expecting and nursing mothers.
  • Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
  • Do not use the product on damaged skin.
  • If a hypersensitivity reaction occurs on the skin, stop using immediately and consult a doctor.
  • Do not apply the product to the entire surface of the body with a single application.
  • Don’t ingest.
  • Wash hands thoroughly after use


CERTIFIED

  • Not tested on animals
  • Dermatological tested
  • Microbiological tested

Title: SP3 Fairtex Black Double Padded Shin Pads
Body HTML:
Constructed of Fairtex durable Syntek Leather with triple layers of high impact foam core, hard on the outer layer and soft on the inner layer, for maximum shock disbursement.

Contoured, form-fitting design for natural feel with fully adjustable leg hook & loop closure straps.

Extended in-step with elastic band strap for maximum secure fit, comfort and protection

Durable cotton stretch denim lining to prevent slipping.

Features:

  • Double padded style
  • Triple layer foam core
  • Form-fitting design
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: SP5 Fairtex Shin Pads Black
Body HTML:
Featuring Fairtex stitching-free or open system between shin protector and foot protector to avoid the press of stitching on your foot that cause injuries and discomfort.

No metal loop, allowed by major events to used in amateur competition.

Constructed of Fairtex durable Syntek Leather with double layers of high impact foam core.

Design to attach to your shin as much as possible for natural feel with extended side and top protection.

Soft piping on turn-up foot protector to avoid irritation to your feet.

Double “F” silk screen to differentiate left and right side, prevent confusion when used.

Durable cotton stretch denim lining to prevent slipping.

Features:

  • Full coverage style
  • Soft piping for comfort
  • No metal loop
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: SP6 Fairtex Neoprene MMA Shin Pads Black
Body HTML:
Made from synthetic rubbers that are produced by polymerisation of chloroprene with good chemical stability, and maintains flexibility over a wide temperature range.

Really attaches to your shins and does not move during training.

Comes with elastic straps on top for tight fit with hook & loop cover for maximum comfort and safety.

Nicely done flat stitching at the back for natural feel with U-SHAPE stitching on tendon position for better comfort of your tendon.

Soft pads on foot protectors.

Features:

  • Neoprene pull-on style
  • Does not move during training
  • U-SHAPE stitching on tendon
  • Soft pads on foot

Title: Fairtex SP9 Ultra Ergo Shin Pads - Black
Body HTML:
Signature Open System:

  • Features Fairtex’s unique open system with stitching-free joints on the shin and toe protectors for maximum comfort and ergonomic movement. The toe and shin protectors can move separately and freely in different directions up to 180 degrees. Note: This shin guard is not detachable like the #SP7 model.

    • New Contoured Padding:

  • The internal padding is meticulously contoured and sloped to perfectly fit and support your shins. The signature open system helps reduce off-centre movement to the left and right while in use.

    • Extended Protection:

  • Designed to expand side protection for more coverage.

    • Strap Adjustability:

  • Extended loop tongue to increase strap adjustability, accommodating users with larger calves. Padded inner strap designed for maximum comfort, which can be folded to shorten the strap and accommodate users with smaller calves.

    • Expanded Toe Protection:

  • Half-inch longer coverage for better toe protection.

    • Material: Syntek Leather

    Features:

    • Signature Open System
    • Contoured Padding
    • Extended Protection
    • Handmade in Thailand
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > MMA Shin Guards

Body HTML:

Fighting rooster is the symbolic for honour and high prestige. The fighting rooster have appeared in Thai society since the Sukhothai Era (1238–1584).

These Thai rooster species is an Pra-Dhu-Hang-Dum or the black tails, one of the four Thai rooster species.

Although there are many different versions of the werewolf tale, these mythical beings are typically understood to be humans who, due to a curse or an infection, have the capacity to turn into wolves or animals resembling wolves at the beginning of a full moon. They frequently act out of animal impulses and feast on human flesh.

Greek mythology has some of the first known accounts of werewolves; for instance, Herodotus (c. 484–c. 425 B.C.) discusses in The Histories a tribe of humans known as the Neuri who transform into wolves for a few days each year. King of Arcadia Lycaon allegedly sought to fool Zeus into eating raw flesh in Ovid's Metamorphoses (to see if he really was a god). Zeus naturally found the trick. changed Lycaon into a wolf as a form of punishment.

There are several versions of the Chinese zodiac signs of tiger and snake. Their respective worldviews, lifestyles, and objectives differ from one another. They would have a hard time bridging these disparities. Their marriage will be filled with squabbles and quarrels due to trivial misunderstandings.

In a conflict, these signals will not give in to one another. The tiger is quick-witted, impetuous, and strong-willed. The Tiger dislikes spending too much time contemplating decisions, favoring hasty judgment over careful thought and debate.

The snake is the complete opposite by nature; it is covert and crafty, taking a long time to make a choice that is probably selfish. Soon the justification for such differentiation would emerge.

Body HTML:
Made from polyester microfiber fabric. Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry. Perfect for training and outdoor activities.

Outstanding design with high quality sublimation printing.

“Elephant” or “Chang” (ช้าง) is chosen as Thailand’s national symbol. One of the key reasons is that Thai people honour the elephant’s incredible strength, durability, and longevity. The white elephant is a symbol of royalty in Thailand because white elephants were incredibly rare and valuable. The word “Chang Seuk” on the tank top means a “war elephant” which is trained and guided by humans for combat.

Title: TT107 TUFF Tank Top Tora Mori to Kingyo
Body HTML:
Made from polyester microfiber fabric. Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry. Perfect for training and outdoor activities.

Outstanding design with high quality sublimation printing.

In Japan, Tora (虎) or Tigers also represent protection from evil and negative energy. Some temple grounds in Kyoto, Japan, include guardian tigers rather than the traditional guardian lions.

The expression FURUYA NO MORU WA TORA O-KAMI YORI MO OSOROSHII means "a leaky roof is more terrifying than a tiger," demonstrating how feared tigers are, and how they have long been the benchmark of terror, awe, or scariness.

The goldfish (金魚) is also popular among women because it represents prosperity, good fortune, having children (in Japan, children are known as kodakara, or kid treasures), household harmony, and wealth accumulation.

Features:

  • Made of microfiber fabric
  • Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry
  • Perfect for training and outdoor activities
  • Outstanding design

Size

Chest
Small 36"
Medium 40"
Large 44"
XL 48"

Title: TUFF Muaythai Boxing Gloves Black Tiger
Body HTML:
TUFF Muay Thai Boxing Gloves, the perfect gear for your martial arts journey! Crafted in Thailand.

The gloves subtly embody the tiger's spirit, paying tribute to Muay Thai's legacy and its ferocious nature.

Tuff Gloves combine durability and comfort for the ultimate training experience. With high-density padding, they ensure unparalleled protection, allowing you to focus on perfecting your techniques.

The microfiber material is flexible and conforms to the curve of your hand to provide the best fit and comfort possible. The result is a glove-like fit that is both natural and comfortable.

Sweat and grime can be removed with ease by wiping on the microfiber material's smooth surface.

Features:

  • Crafted in Thailand
  • Unique Tiger artwork
  • High-density padding
  • Microfiber material

Title: Yuth Boxing Gloves - Gold Line Black-Gold
Body HTML:
Introducing the Yuth Gold Line Boxing Gloves, the epitome of premium craftsmanship and performance featuring premium gold leather accents. Crafted with precision and passion, these gloves are the ultimate fusion of style, performance, and durability.

Designed with the needs of athletes in mind, these gloves boast high-quality materials that provide optimal protection and support during intense training sessions.

The ergonomic design ensures a snug and comfortable fit, allowing you to focus solely on honing your skills without distractions.

These gloves feature a multi-layered foam padding system that provides optimal shock absorption and impact protection, reducing the risk of injury while maximising comfort and support.

Fairtex Approved - Made in Thailand in conjunction with Fairtex in Pattaya and all hand tested in their world famous muaythai gym.

Features:

  • Precision crafted
  • Ergonomic design
  • Premium leather
  • Made in Thailand
  • Fairtex approved

Title: Yuth Boxing Gloves - Supportive Red-White-Blue
Body HTML:
Introducing Yuth Supportive Boxing Gloves – your essential partner in the gym! Engineered with premium materials for durability and featuring multi-layered foam padding, these gloves offer unparalleled support and protection during intense training sessions.

Constructed with premium quality materials, Yuth Competition Boxing Gloves offer unparalleled durability and protection, ensuring that your hands are shielded during intense training sessions and competitions.

With their ergonomic design and secure wrist strap, Yuth gloves ensure optimal hand alignment, reducing strain and fatigue.

Fairtex Approved - Made in Thailand in conjunction with Fairtex in Pattaya and all hand tested in their world famous muaythai gym.

Features:

  • Great wrist support
  • Ergonomic design
  • Premium leather
  • Made in Thailand
  • Fairtex approved

Title: Primo Mamba Series Boxing Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
The Mamba Series Boxing Gloves represent an evolution into a more sophisticated mood and tone. Features sleek lines, stylized iconography and custom fonts. Comes with matching Muay Thai Shorts in all 5 colours. Handle the drip with caution. 

Features:

  • Hand Made In Thailand
  • Super Grip and Knuckle Suspension
  • Tucked Thumb For Greater Control
  • Locally Sourced Premium Thai Leather
  • Soft Rubber Label With Rounded Edges
  • Layered sports grade foam for added protection
  • Extra foam in wrist area for absorbing kicks
  • Superior Ergonomic Fit Designed For Extreme Comfort
  • Long Cuff With Superior Wrist Protection VS Standard Thai Gloves

Title: Primo Emblem 2.0 Boxing Gloves - Onyx Black
Body HTML:
The perfect pair of Muay Thai gloves for bag-work, sparring and pad-work.

Designed to set a new Thai benchmark for quality, design, and performance.

Built as a puncher’s glove that provides the ultimate knuckle protection along with superior open palm clinch capabilities. The Emblem series offers exceptional padding, comfort, and support where needed.

Features:

  • Hand Made In Thailand
  • Super Grip and Knuckle Suspension
  • Tucked Thumb For Greater Control
  • Locally Sourced Premium Thai Leather
  • Soft Rubber Label With Rounded Edges
  • 4 Layers of Protective Sports Grade Foam
  • Extra Padding For Protection Against Kicks
  • Superior Ergonomic Fit Designed For Extreme Comfort
  • Long Cuff With Superior Wrist Protection VS Standard Thai Gloves

    • Note: These gloves may require a short break-in period and 16oz glove is a large sparring glove.

Title: Primo Emblem 2.0 Semi Leather Boxing Glove - Arctic Blue
Body HTML:
Muay Thai gloves for the modern athlete.

Hone in on your targets with unrivalled precision and dexterity. Compact and lightweight, experience sharper, cleaner, and crisper punches. Built for superior knuckle sensitivity and grip control. Delivers lightning fast reaction speeds.

8oz and 10oz sizes now available in "Compact Fit". For ladies, or those with smaller hands or who wish to have an extra snug fitting glove.

Features:

  • Humidity Resistant
  • Hand Made In Thailand
  • Double Striped Thumb Stitching
  • Extra Curved Thumb For Greater Control
  • Premium Grade Soft Semi Leather - No Peeling
  • Superior Ergonomic Fit Designed For Extreme Comfort

Note: These gloves may require a short break-in period and 16oz glove is a large sparring glove.

Body HTML:
The no.1 MVP small Thai kick pads in the game.

These are an all time favourite for head coaches far and wide. Perfect for freestyle and technical pad work. The Elite Small Kick pads provide a high level of agility while being extremely light and solid. Comes with a raised forearm cushion for better impact absorption.

Features:

  • Ergonomic design with excellent padding
  • Available in leather and premium microfiber

Title: Primo E.S.C. (Elite Strikers Club) Compression Shorts - Onyx
Body HTML:
E.S.C. ELITE STRIKERS CLUB COMPRESSION SHORTS

Versatile, flexible, and agile… The E.S.C. Compression Shorts are designed to enhance your combat and athletic performance. Made of lightweight and cooling materials, these shorts offer unparalleled mobility and are designed to flow naturally with each move you make. Comes with hidden phone pockets on both legs.

Important note on sizing: When comparing to our Muay Thai shorts sizes, they fit a bit looser around the waist, make sure to check the size guide. Tie the drawstring for a secure fit.

Features:

  • Laser cut and bonded back panel
  • Adjustable ventilated waistband
  • Dual inner legging phone pockets
  • Suitable for various kinds of athletic training
  • Body: 96% Polyester, 4% Elastane
  • Legging: 80% Polyester, 20% Elastane

    • Panpayak is 5' 9’’, 145 pounds and wears size M

Title: Primo Pro Lace-Up Boxing Gloves - Onyx Black
Body HTML:
The coveted Primo Pro Lace Up boxing glove.

Designed to set a new benchmark for quality, design, and performance across all types of Muay Thai and boxing training.

Built as a puncher’s glove that provides the ultimate knuckle protection along with superior open palm clinch capabilities. The Primo Pro Lace Up series offers exceptional padding, comfort, and support where needed.

Features:

  • Hand made In Thailand
  • Compact fit
  • Super grip and knuckle suspension
  • Tucked thumb for greater control
  • Locally sourced premium Thai leather

Title: BGVL4 Twins Boxing Gloves Black
Body HTML:
The Twins Special BGVL4 model is the highly anticipated, improved version of the classic BGVL3 with the same great shape and fit but with a redefined padding on the back of the glove. The result is a streamlined glove that performs better during clinching, has less excess bulk but with the same level of protection that has made Twins gloves a staple of the boxing and Muaythai worlds for over 30 years.

With a durable velcro strap and attached contoured thumb these gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Twins BGVL4 are a great all-round use glove ideal for use on pads and bags (10-12oz) and for sparring (14-16oz).

Multi-layered foam padding for ultimate shock absorption. Once "broken-in", Twins gloves shape to your hands for a comfortable tight fit.

Hand made in Thailand from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Attached thumb
  • Streamlined shape
  • 100% Thai leather
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & MMA Gloves & Mitts

Title: BGVL4 Twins Boxing Gloves Grey
Body HTML:
The Twins Special BGVL4 model is the highly anticipated, improved version of the classic BGVL3 with the same great shape and fit but with a redefined padding on the back of the glove. The result is a streamlined glove that performs better during clinching, has less excess bulk but with the same level of protection that has made Twins gloves a staple of the boxing and Muaythai worlds for over 30 years.

With a durable velcro strap and attached contoured thumb these gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Twins BGVL4 are a great all-round use glove ideal for use on pads and bags (10-12oz) and for sparring (14-16oz).

Multi-layered foam padding for ultimate shock absorption. Once "broken-in", Twins gloves shape to your hands for a comfortable tight fit.

Hand made in Thailand from high grade Thai leather.

  • Attached thumb

Title: BGVL14 Twins Boxing Gloves Dark Brown
Body HTML:
The Twins BGVL14 model features increased padding on both the palm area and wrist and features a unique design stitched into the back of the gloves giving it a quilted effect.

Twins velcro boxing gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Great all-round use gloves ideal for use on pads, bags and for sparring.

Attached thumb design for safety and to protect from injuries.

Durable velcro wrist strap for gives a secure, comfortable fit and ensures long lasting gloves that will really last the distance.

The original classic Twins gloves that have led the way in muaythai, pro boxing and MMA for many years.

Made from high grade Thai leather.

Title: FBGVL4-52 Twins Nagas Boxing Gloves White-Gold
Body HTML:
Twins signature design gloves for those that want to stand out down the gym. Innovative artistic designs from Twins designed in Thailand.

Made in the BGVL4 model style, the improved version of the classic BGVL3 with the same great shape and fit but with a redefined padding on the back of the glove. The result is a streamlined glove that performs better during clinching, has less excess bulk but with the same level of protection that has made Twins gloves a staple of the boxing and Muaythai worlds for over 30 years.

With a durable velcro strap and attached contoured thumb these gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Twins BGVL4 are a great all-round use glove ideal for use on pads and bags (10-12oz) and for sparring (14-16oz).

Multi-layered foam padding for ultimate shock absorption. Once "broken-in", Twins gloves shape to your hands for a comfortable tight fit.

Hand made in Thailand from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Attached thumb
  • Streamlined shape
  • 100% Thai leather

Title: Twins Special FSGL10-66 Leather Shin Pads - Comic
Body HTML:
Twins signature series leather shin pads featuring unique artwork and designs.

Double padded shin pads from Twins that are ideal for heavy sparring sessions as they provide lots of protection for the shin and have very good foot coverage. They are also very light and ergonomically shaped to allow for great manoeuvrability.

Multi layered shock absorbing foam.

Made from 100% high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Double Padded
  • Ergonomically Shaped Design
  • High Grade Thai Leather


Shin Length Foot Length
Small 34 cm 14 cm
Medium 36 cm 15 cm
Large 38 cm 17 cm
XL 41 cm 18 cm

Know your shin pads...

Twins make shin pads in three different materials: leather (SGL), high-grade synthetic (SGS) and an accessible cheaper quality synthetic (SGDM). A lot of shops don't make this known or use the incorrect product codes so it's worth knowing when comparing models and prices online.

Made from 100% Thai leather and top-of-the-line high density padding.

Title: RMS120 TUFF High-Cut Retro Muaythai Shorts Berserkers Fury
Body HTML:
Inspired by the fearsome warriors of the Viking era. Crafted for those who follow the primal rage and relentless spirit of the Berserkers. The striking face of a Berserker warrior during battle is depicted with fierce eyes and a snarling expression in the front.

Unleash your inner warrior with the intricate design of Berserker armour and shield adorning the back. Blending ancient Norse design with our high-performance fabric for comfort and flexibility, with the unstoppable power of the Viking era, and conquering the ring in style with the "Berserker's Fury" Muay Thai shorts.

This style of Muay Thai shorts have a wide-leg cut, which facilitates extreme movements such as kicking. The elastic waistband provides both comfort and utility.

Made of microfiber fabric. Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry. 100% handmade in Thailand.

Shorts should be hand washed cold and drip-dried for maximum longevity.

Title: RMS124 TUFF High-Cut Retro Muaythai Shorts Purple An-Chan
Body HTML:
Embrace the perfect blend of beauty and power with TUFF Muay Thai Shorts, inspired by two of Thailand’s most beloved flowers: the purple Butterfly Pea (An-Chan) and the orange Pomegranate Blossom (Tub-Tim). These elegant blooms, deeply rooted in Thai culture, symbolize resilience, vitality, and the grace of a fighter’s spirit.

The An-Chan, with its rich purple hues, embodies clarity and focus, reflecting the calm precision of a warrior in action. The Tub-Tim, in its vibrant orange, channels energy and bold determination, a reminder of the fire within every fighter. Together, they celebrate the balance of strength and elegance that defines Muay Thai.

These shorts are made from lightweight microfiber fabric for ultimate comfort, durability, and effortless movement. The secure elastic waistband ensures a flattering and reliable fit, letting you train or fight with confidence and style.

The Floral Spirit—a symbol of your power, passion, and beauty. Step into the ring and let your strength shine.

Title: RMS126 TUFF High-Cut Retro Muaythai Shorts The Siam in Motion
Body HTML:
Step into the ring with the essence of Thailand. The Amazing Thailand Collection is a tribute to the country's most iconic symbols, woven together with the fierce spirit of Muay Thai. Featuring a unique blend of art styles, each pair of shorts brings to life the power, culture, and legacy of Thailand’s landmarks, including the Tuk Tuk, temples, elephants, and the beauty of its landscapes.

The Siam in Motion

Bold, sleek, and futuristic. The Red Minimal Graphic Design shorts take the vibrant symbols of Thailand and transform them into a cutting-edge, minimalist graphic style. Featuring the Tuk Tuk, majestic elephant, sacred temples, and Yaksa in clean, sharp lines, this design captures Thailand’s modern energy, while staying grounded in its legendary history. The red background symbolizes the passion, power, and fire of a true Muay Thai fighter.

Each pair of shorts in this collection is made from premium microfiber fabric, providing comfort, durability, and flexibility in the ring. The elastic waistband ensures a secure fit, empowering you to move freely, whether in training or in competition.

The Spirit of Amazing Thailand Collection—where culture meets strength, and tradition fuels the modern fighter. Which style will you choose to embody the heart of Thailand?

Title: TUFF Muaythai Boxing Gloves Naga
Body HTML:
Introducing TUFF Muay Thai Boxing Naga Gloves, your ultimate companion for a fierce and focused training experience. Crafted in Thailand, these gloves not only honor Muay Thai's rich legacy but also embody the spirit of the Naga, a mythical creature representing water and abundance. In Thai culture, Nagas are revered protectors of Buddhism and are often associated with strength and protection.

TUFF Naga Gloves offer exceptional durability and comfort for an unparalleled training experience. With high-density padding, provides outstanding protection, letting you focus fully on improving your techniques. The flexible material adapts to the shape of your hand, ensuring a snug and comfortable fit. The traditional design features a striking black Naga set against a crisp white background, paired with a classic Yantra for a bold and impactful look. The smooth surface makes it easy to wipe away sweat and grime, keeping your gloves fresh and ready for every session.

The microfiber material is flexible and conforms to the curve of your hand to provide the best fit and comfort possible. The result is a glove-like fit that is both natural and comfortable.

Features:

  • Crafted in Thailand
  • Unique Tiger artwork
  • High-density padding
  • Microfiber material

Title: BS1950 Fairtex White Tech House Muaythai Shorts
Body HTML:
Fairtex Muay Thai shorts are designed to give fighters the edge they need in the ring. Tailored to be slimmer than traditional sizing, these shorts enhance your mobility and agility, allowing you to move with precision and speed.

Despite the slimmer cut, they maintain a larger fit compared to our kickboxing collection, ensuring optimal comfort and flexibility, even during the most intense training sessions.

New style piping on the legs for a premium finish.

Featuring a smaller 6-strip elastic waistband rather than the traditional 8. Secure if needed with an inner drawstring.

Handmade in Thailand.

Features:

  • Long lasting satin
  • Slim cut fit
  • High side slit
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Fairtex Boxing Glove Deodorisers
Body HTML:
Combat Odour & Moisture: Fairtex glove deodorizers are expertly crafted to absorb excess moisture and neutralize odours, keeping your gloves fresh and ready for your next workout.

Prolong Glove Lifespan: These inserts help extend the lifespan of your gloves by eliminating moisture levels, preventing material wear and tear.

Long-Lasting Freshness: Engineered for durability, these reusable inserts provide a reliable, eco-friendly solution for maintaining odour-free gear over time.

User-Friendly Design: The slim, lightweight design allows for easy insertion into gloves, and the durable build ensures they stay securely in place during use.

Essential for Athletes: Ideal for boxing, kickboxing, and Muay Thai gloves, these deodorizers can be used for Goalie gloves, Hockey gloves, Lacrosse gloves, Ski Gloves, and more

Title: Fairtex Sports Socks White-Black
Body HTML:
Step into the spirit of Muay Thai with Fairtex socks, a stylish and functional pair of socks featuring a white base with bold double stripes—one sock displaying the iconic "Fairtex" logo and the other proudly stating "Muay Thai." Designed to blend tradition with performance, these socks offer advanced comfort and support for everyday wear or training.

Features:

  • Unique design with "Fairtex" on one sock and "Muay Thai" on the other
  • Premium fabric blend: 73% Cotton, 24% Nylon, 3% Spandex
  • Dry-fit, quick-drying, and anti-bacterial properties
  • Welt & rib structure for stretch without shrinkage
  • Mesh ventilation, arch support, and cushioned heels for all-day comfort
  • Thick cushion sole for shock absorption and impact protection

Body HTML:
Fairtex 100% Bamboo Towel #TOWEL01

Embrace Comfort and Strength with 100% Bamboo Towels

Bamboo towels are exceptionally soft and highly durable. Their high absorbency and gentle texture eliminate the need to rub your skin, preventing irritation. Additionally, they are an excellent choice for those with allergies or sensitivities to synthetic fabrics.

Composition: 55% Bamboo (Rayon) 45% Cotton

Available colors: Navy Blue, Ovaltine

  • Effective against P. Acne
  • Highly absorbent
  • Incredibly soft and fluffy
  • Reduces unpleasant odors
  • Made from sustainable materials
  • Certified Oeko-Tex Standard 100

Title: BGVL4P Twins Pastel Gloves Sky Blue
Body HTML:
The Pastel Collection from Twins Special

The Twins Special BGVL4 model is the highly anticipated, improved version of the classic BGVL3 with the same great shape and fit but with a redefined padding on the back of the glove. The result is a streamlined glove that performs better during clinching, has less excess bulk but with the same level of protection that has made Twins gloves a staple of the boxing and Muaythai worlds for over 30 years.

With a durable velcro strap and attached contoured thumb these gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Twins BGVL4 are a great all-round use glove ideal for use on pads and bags (10-12oz) and for sparring (14-16oz).

Multi-layered foam padding for ultimate shock absorption. Once "broken-in", Twins gloves shape to your hands for a comfortable tight fit.

Hand made in Thailand from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Attached thumb
  • Streamlined shape
  • 100% Thai leather

Title: Primo Emblem 2.0 Boxing Gloves - Seraph White
Body HTML:
The perfect pair of Muay Thai gloves for bag-work, sparring and pad-work.

Designed to set a new Thai benchmark for quality, design, and performance.

Built as a puncher’s glove that provides the ultimate knuckle protection along with superior open palm clinch capabilities. The Emblem series offers exceptional padding, comfort, and support where needed.

Features:

  • Hand Made In Thailand
  • Super Grip and Knuckle Suspension
  • Tucked Thumb For Greater Control
  • Locally Sourced Premium Thai Leather
  • Soft Rubber Label With Rounded Edges
  • 4 Layers of Protective Sports Grade Foam
  • Extra Padding For Protection Against Kicks
  • Superior Ergonomic Fit Designed For Extreme Comfort
  • Long Cuff With Superior Wrist Protection VS Standard Thai Gloves

    • Note: These gloves may require a short break-in period and 16oz glove is a large sparring glove.

Title: MS687 TUFF Muay Thai Shorts - The Emerald King
Body HTML:
Traditional style Muay Thai shorts with full waistband and wide leg cut.

Made of microfiber fabric. Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry. 100% handmade in Thailand.

Shorts should be hand washed cold and drip-dried for maximum longevity.

Step into the arena of legends with TUFF Muay Thai Shorts, inspired by the mythic duel of two Titans locked in a ferocious battle to prove who is truly the strongest.

The The Emerald King (Green Titan), commanding the Naga—Serpentine Lords of the Abyss—the power of the deep. Opposing him,  The Amethyst King (Purple Titan) stands alongside the Sigha—mighty Guardians of the Jungle. Their strikes echo with thunder, their power shaking the world as their eternal conflict rages.

This stunning design captures the essence of their battle, featuring the Titans with their loyal forces: the Naga and the Sigha. This electrifying design captures the raw intensity of their fight, featuring vivid imagery of the Titan's mid-combat.

Crafted from premium microfiber fabric, these shorts combine lightweight comfort, durability, and sweat-free performance to keep you moving freely during training or combat. The secure elastic waistband ensures they stay in place whether you’re training, sparring, or unleashing your inner titan.

Step into the arena of legends, with TUFF's Clash of Titans Collection. Prove your strength.

Features:

  • Made of microfiber fabric
  • Lightweight, sweat-free, and quick dry
  • Traditional style muaythai shorts
  • Handmade in Thailand

Spice Up Your Strikes

The Som Tum Smash Muay Thai Shorts capture the explosive, tangy flavour of Thailand’s favourite papaya salad — fiery, fresh, and fast, just like your fighting style.

A Design That Kicks Back
Bright green papaya strands, red chili peppers, and mortar-and-pestle graphics burst across a vibrant background inspired by Thai street markets. The energy is chaotic and colourful, echoing the fast, flavourful rhythm of life in Thailand.

Made for Sharp Strikers
Crafted from high-performance microfiber fabric, these shorts are ultra-light, breathable, and moisture-wicking. Whether you're delivering crisp knees or dodging counters, the secure elastic waistband keeps your movement smooth and your mind focused.

Som Tum Smash Muay Thai Shorts — for fighters who never hold back the spice.

Title: TUFF Payak Muay Thai Shorts - MS002 - Tom Yum Power
Body HTML:
Boil with Intensity. Strike with Heat.

The Tom Yum Power Muay Thai Shorts are inspired by Thailand’s legendary hot and sour soup — a dish known for its bold heat, layered complexity, and fiery finish. These shorts are made for fighters who cook up chaos and leave a sting behind.

A Design That Heats Up the Ring
Vivid shrimp motifs leap across a fiery broth of reds, oranges, and lime-greens. Lemongrass and chili silhouettes swirl in the background like rising steam. It’s a design that simmers with energy and bursts with attitude.

Engineered for the Heat of Battle
Made with lightweight, quick-drying microfiber fabric, these shorts offer breathability and freedom of movement for every kick, clinch, and strike. The stretch waistband ensures a snug fit — even when the heat turns up.

Tom Yum Power Muay Thai Shorts — bring the heat, taste the win.

Title: TUFF Payak Muay Thai Shorts - RMS001 - Raijin the Thunder God
Body HTML:
Unleash the Elemental Power of the Storm Guardians Collection
Inspired by the legendary Japanese gods Fuujin and Raijin, the Storm Guardians Collection channels the primal forces of wind and thunder. These iconic deities symbolize the raw strength, chaos, and precision that every fighter brings into the ring.

TUFF Payak Raijin Shorts – The Thunder God
Command the storm with the Raijin Shorts, inspired by Raijin, the master of thunder and lightning. Featuring intricate designs of Raijin striking his Taiko drum to summon mighty storms, these shorts embody the booming power and chaos of thunder. A fierce tiger’s face adds a layer of dominance and strength, symbolizing the unstoppable force within you. Designed for warriors ready to shake the ring with their power and precision.

Title: Fairtex FGV12 Ultimate MMA Gloves - Blue
Body HTML:
The Fairtex FGV12 Ultimate Combat Gloves are designed for both striking and grappling in MMA fights. They feature an open-thumb loop that allows for greater thumb mobility and makes it easier to grab an opponent during clinches or takedowns.

The gloves feature a patented open-palm design with split knuckles and the signature open-thumb loop designed for optimal grappling control with minimal restriction.

Made from premium quality leather, they incorporate Fairtex’s signature three-layered foam core system for outstanding hand and knuckle protection with excellent shock absorption.

Official gloves of ONE Championship, Cage Warriors and previously seen on major MMA events such as Strikeforce, WEC, EliteXC, IFL, HDnet, Bodog, Affliction, M1, Pancrase, Fusion Fighting Championship and more.

Features:

  • Open-thumb loop for enhanced mobility
  • Three-layered foam core for superior protection
  • Premium quality leather

Title: Fairtex SP9 Ultra Ergo Shin Pads - White
Body HTML:
Signature Open System:

  • Features Fairtex’s unique open system with stitching-free joints on the shin and toe protectors for maximum comfort and ergonomic movement. The toe and shin protectors can move separately and freely in different directions up to 180 degrees. Note: This shin guard is not detachable like the #SP7 model.

    • New Contoured Padding:

  • The internal padding is meticulously contoured and sloped to perfectly fit and support your shins. The signature open system helps reduce off-centre movement to the left and right while in use.

    • Extended Protection:

  • Designed to expand side protection for more coverage.

    • Strap Adjustability:

  • Extended loop tongue to increase strap adjustability, accommodating users with larger calves. Padded inner strap designed for maximum comfort, which can be folded to shorten the strap and accommodate users with smaller calves.

    • Expanded Toe Protection:

  • Half-inch longer coverage for better toe protection.

    • Material: Syntek Leather

    Features:

    • Signature Open System
    • Contoured Padding
    • Extended Protection
    • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Twins Special FBGVL4-49 Boxing Gloves - Dragon - Black-Gold
Body HTML:
Twins signature design gloves for those that want to stand out down the gym. Innovative artistic designs from Twins designed in Thailand.

Made in the BGVL4 model style, the improved version of the classic BGVL3 with the same great shape and fit but with a redefined padding on the back of the glove. The result is a streamlined glove that performs better during clinching, has less excess bulk but with the same level of protection that has made Twins gloves a staple of the boxing and Muaythai worlds for over 30 years.

With a durable velcro strap and attached contoured thumb these gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Twins BGVL4 are a great all-round use glove ideal for use on pads and bags (10-12oz) and for sparring (14-16oz).

Multi-layered foam padding for ultimate shock absorption. Once "broken-in", Twins gloves shape to your hands for a comfortable tight fit.

Hand made in Thailand from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Attached thumb
  • Streamlined shape
  • 100% Thai leather

Title: Twins Special FBGVDM3-TW6 Synthetic-Leather Boxing Gloves - Grey
Body HTML:
Twins high quality synthetic boxing gloves provide a durable non-leather option for vegans or those just looking for a cheaper alternative to leather gloves.

Twins velcro boxing gloves are designed for maximum hand and wrist protection during training sessions. Great all-round use gloves ideal for use on pads, bags and for sparring.

Attached thumb design for safety and to protect from injuries.

Durable velcro wrist strap for gives a secure, comfortable fit and ensures long lasting gloves that will really last the distance.

The original classic Twins #BGVL3 glove design.

  • Good all-round glove

Title: Twins Special SGL10 Leather Shin Pads - Black
Body HTML:
Double padded shin pads from Twins that are ideal for heavy sparring sessions as they provide lots of protection for the shin and have very good foot coverage. Ergonomically shaped to allow for great manoeuvrability.

Multi layered shock absorbing foam.

Made from genuine high grade Thai Leather. 

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Double Padded
  • Ergonomically Shaped Design
  • Genuine High Grade Thai Leather


Shin Length Foot Length
Small 34 cm 14 cm
Medium 36 cm 15 cm
Large 38 cm 17 cm
XL 41 cm 18 cm

Know your shin pads...

Twins make shin pads in three different materials: genuine leather (SGL), high-grade microfibre (SGS) and an accessible cheaper quality synthetic (SGDM). A lot of shops don't make this known or use the incorrect product codes so it's worth knowing when comparing models and prices online.

Double padded shin pads from Twins that are ideal for heavy sparring sessions as they provide lots of protection for the shin and have very good foot coverage. Ergonomically shaped to allow for great manoeuvrability.

Multi layered shock absorbing foam.

Made from genuine high grade Thai Leather.

Know your shin pads...

Twins make shin pads in three different materials: genuine leather (SGL), high-grade microfibre (SGS) and an accessible cheaper quality synthetic (SGDM). A lot of shops don't make this known or use the incorrect product codes so it's worth knowing when comparing models and prices online.

Title: Twins Special FHGL3-66 Leather Sparring Headguard - Comic
Body HTML:
The Twins Headguard has additional padding in the chin and cheek areas. It allows for a good range-of-vision while still offering a high degree of protection.

It is designed for full contact sparring and holds up to the punishment dished out by world-class fighters. The firm, high-density foam padding and greater face coverage increase safety and improve the balance between comfort and shock absorption.

Made from high grade Thai leather.

Features:

  • Handmade in Thailand
  • Designed for sparring
  • Lace-up top
  • Durable Velcro back closure

Title: Primo E.S.C. (Elite Strikers Club) Compression Shorts - Aegean Blue
Body HTML:
E.S.C. ELITE STRIKERS CLUB COMPRESSION SHORTS

Versatile, flexible, and agile… The E.S.C. Compression Shorts are designed to enhance your combat and athletic performance. Made of lightweight and cooling materials, these shorts offer unparalleled mobility and are designed to flow naturally with each move you make. Comes with hidden phone pockets on both legs.

Important note on sizing: When comparing to our Muay Thai shorts sizes, they fit a bit looser around the waist, make sure to check the size guide. Tie the drawstring for a secure fit.

Features:

  • Laser cut and bonded back panel
  • Adjustable ventilated waistband
  • Dual inner legging phone pockets
  • Suitable for various kinds of athletic training
  • Body: 96% Polyester, 4% Elastane
  • Legging: 80% Polyester, 20% Elastane

Body HTML:
Extra-large design to provide a more imposing opponent to hit and build more strength and power to the upper body.

Constructed of high grade Thai Leather and non-tear nylon at the top with heavy duty water resistant and non-tear nylon lining with nylon web straps.

We recommend using a swivel on Fairtex punch bags which allows the bag to freely spin, increasing the life of the straps.

Title: Fairtex AS2 Padded Ankle Supports - Black
Body HTML:
The new Fairtex Padded Ankle Support is built for combat athletes who demand more from their gear.

A major upgrade from the previous model, these supports now feature added padding on the lower shin and the joint connecting to the in-step, offering superior cushioning and comfort.

This enhancement not only improves support but also reduces shock impact, making them ideal for high-intensity training and sparring. Made from high-quality, breathable fabric, they ensure a snug, comfortable fit throughout your sessions.

Perfect for Muay Thai, Kickboxing, and MMA athletes.

Features:

  • Made from high-quality, breathable fabric
  • Minimal black design with iconic Fairtex logo in white
  • Enhanced protection and performance
  • Extra padding on the lower shin and ankle joint

Body HTML:
The GC2 Muay Thai Protective Cup is built in the traditional style used in Muay Thai, kickboxing, and combat sports.

It features a durable protective insert housed within a soft-padded outer layer to offer firm and compact protection.

The three-point adjustable strap system ensures a secure and stable fit during movement, making it ideal for athletes seeking authentic gear with reliable protection.

Features:

Title: Fairtex KC1 Boxing Glove Keyring - Black
Body HTML:
Carry a piece of Muay Thai heritage wherever you go with the Fairtex Boxing Glove Key Chain.

Handcrafted with care, this miniature glove symbolises Fairtex, Muaythai and Thailand—the birthplace of Muay Thai. A popular and affordable souvenir for over a decade, it’s the perfect keepsake for the muaythai enthusiast.

Features:

  • Handcrafted miniature boxing glove design
  • Symbolic keepsake from Fairtex and Thailand
  • Affordable and popular souvenir
  • Perfect for Muay Thai fans and travellers

Title: Fairtex BGV1C-PLUS Microfibre Boxing Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
Fairtex BGV1C-PLUS Boxing Gloves - The Next Evolution of the Iconic BGV1 – Reimagined for Maximum Performance

Introducing the all-new BGV1C-PLUS — an upgraded version of Fairtex’s best-selling BGV1 gloves, designed with professional athletes in mind. This model isn’t just about aesthetics — it’s engineered to deliver enhanced performance, greater comfort, and consistent quality, round after round.

Key Features:

Upgraded Construction

  • Crafted from high-quality microfiber, BGV1C-PLUS offers exceptional softness, durability, and resistance to wear — while maintaining a clean, uniform appearance across every pair.

Consistent Weight & Balance

  • Thanks to precise material control and improved padding structure, each glove delivers stable and uniform weight, ensuring consistent performance and feel — ideal for serious training and competition.

New High-Flex Foam Padding

  • Engineered for better shock absorption and energy efficiency. The glove’s core allows for easier fist formation, reduces energy loss when clenching, and improves hand alignment during impact.

Enhanced Fit & Ergonomics

  • A redesigned inner compartment provides a snug, secure fit while promoting better thumb positioning and natural hand closure. The grip bar and thumb pocket have been optimised for faster fist formation and greater control.

Colour-Matching Wrist Patch

  • Each pair features a colour-coordinated Fairtex patch on the wrist strap to distinguish it from our traditional BGV1 leather gloves.

Tested by Professionals

  • BGV1C-PLUS has undergone extensive testing by professional fighters and trainers over several months, earning high praise for comfort, control, and performance in the ring.
Category: Sporting Goods > Athletics > Boxing & Martial Arts > Boxing & Martial Arts Protective Gear > Boxing & MMA Gloves & Mitts

Title: Fairtex BGV14 Microfibre Boxing Gloves - Black (Red Trim)
Body HTML:
New design gloves with long cuff made using Microfiber for the outer shell to make a consistent weight.

Microfiber is odourless, endurable, flexible, soft and a smooth finish. As it's a non-leather material, it's vegan friendly.

Very easy to form a fist in order to save your energy during training. Combines some characteristics of the classic #BGV6 sparring gloves with extra padding on the palm area for maximum comfort and safety.

Features:

  • Long cuff design
  • Padded palm
  • Easy to form a fist
  • High quality Microfiber

Title: Fairtex SP10 Calf Kick Protection - Black
Body HTML:
Professional-Grade Shin Protection for Serious Fighters

The Fairtex Calf Kick Protection shin guards are engineered for fighters who demand the best. Crafted with premium microfiber leather and high-density foam, these shin guards deliver exceptional shock absorption to protect you during intense training and competition.

Battle-Tested Performance

Rigorously tested by professional athletes who compete regularly and rely on heavy low kick techniques, these shin guards have proven their durability and protective capabilities in real combat situations. When your training involves relentless low kicks, you need protection that won't let you down.

Features:

  • Superior Shock Absorption: High-quality foam core absorbs and disperses impact effectively
  • Premium Microfiber Leather: Durable, easy to clean, and built to last through countless training sessions
  • Universal Fit Design: Innovative back strap folds over multiple times to accommodate all calf sizes while ensuring a secure, snug fit
  • Complete Pair: Sold as a pair for full leg protection
  • Optimal Dimensions: Each guard measures 25 x 34 x 45 cm for comprehensive coverage
  • Whether you're a professional fighter or a dedicated practitioner of Muay Thai, kickboxing, or MMA, the Fairtex Calf Kick Protection provides the confidence you need to train harder and compete fearlessly.

Title: Fairtex BGV19 Deluxe Tight-Fit Boxing Gloves - White
Body HTML:
The latest glove from Fairtex improves on the classic #BGV1 universal model with an improved hand compartment that is more tight fitting and compact than usual, with slightly more padding on the knuckle area. This combined with an improved thumb position similar the the #BGV16 and the inclusion of a grip bar makes these one of the finest compact tight-fit gloves available.

Constructed of premium quality leather with Fairtex's signature three-layered foam system for excellent hand and knuckle protection and shock disbursement.

Features:

  • Deluxe version of #BGV1 style
  • More tight fitting and compact
  • More padding on the knuckle area
  • Improved thumb position
  • Includes a grip bar
  • Premium quality leather

Title: Fairtex BGV1 Dark Cloud Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
This special edition of our classic BGV model features the striking “Dark Cloud” design. These gloves retain all the features and functionality of the Universal Gloves Tight-Fit design.

Crafted from premium quality leather, they incorporate Fairtex's signature three-layered foam system for superior hand and knuckle protection and effective shock disbursement. The contoured hand compartment provides a secure, snug fit for maximum comfort and performance.

Features:

  • Premium Leather
  • Limited Edition Design
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Fairtex BGV21 Legacy Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
The "Legacy" boxing gloves feature the original Fairtex logo from 1971. Crafted from matte brown genuine leather and combined with three-layered foam padding, they are as robust and functional as any training gloves.

The BGV21 is a modified version of the BGV1 model, undergoing a special process that gives them a "raw" texture, making them softer. This special edition comes with unique paper box packaging.

Features:

  • Premium Leather
  • Limited Edition Design
  • Handmade in Thailand

Title: Fairtex BGV14PT Painter Microfibre Boxing Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
The paint-splash design of each pair of gloves is made by hand, one by one and depending on the mood of our artist. So, you will own unique gloves that only belong to you and never found anywhere else. No two pairs will ever be the same; a groundbreaking new concept from Fairtex.

New design gloves with long cuff made using Microfiber for the outer shell to make a consistent weight.

Microfiber is odourless, endurable, flexible, soft and a smooth finish. As it's a non-leather material, it's vegan friendly.

Very easy to form a fist in order to save your energy during training. Combines some characteristics of the classic #BGV6 sparring gloves with extra padding on the palm area for maximum comfort and safety.

Due to the nature of this unique concept, the design you get will vary slightly from those shown in the picture.

Features:

  • Individually hand-painted
  • Each pair is unique
  • Easy to form a fist
  • High quality Microfiber

Title: Fairtex FIORE Limited Edition Boxing Gloves
Body HTML:
The FIORE collection is a fusion of beauty and beast mode — where artistry meets power.

These gloves are a reimagined version of our classic BGV model, crafted in two-tone genuine leather and adorned with custom butterfly graphics, hand-drawn by a freehand artist.

Sold with a custom nylon bag packaging.

Features:

  • Two-tone genuine leather
  • Hand-screened details
  • Comes in a custom drawstring bag

Title: Fairtex BGL6 Lace-up Competition Boxing Gloves - White
Body HTML:
Professional competition gloves as used in championship fights around the world.

Engineered with a contoured and snug-fit hand compartment with locked-thumb design for optimal fist closure and to minimise eyes and thumb injuries.

Constructed of premium quality leather with Fairtex original pre-curved triple-layered foam core system at the knuckle hitting area for toe-to-toe actions.

Features:

  • Premium grade leather
  • Triple-layer foam
  • Pre-curved thumb
  • Professional competition gloves

Title: Fairtex BGL3 Lace-up Sparring Gloves - Black
Body HTML:
Durable construction with premium grade leather and pre-curved triple-layers of pliable foam system for the already "broken-in feel" and natural fit for sparring and training.

Attached curved thumb design for optimal fist closure, minimising hand and wrist muscle tensions and minimising eye and thumb injuries.

Specially designed for sparring with additional wrist support and knuckle padding for maximum safety.

Features:

  • Premium grade leather
  • Triple-layer foam
  • Pre-curved thumb
  • Designed for sparring
